titleStmt.title: The dolefull dance and song of death; intituled; Dance after my pipe To a pleasant new tune.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Thomas, fl. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F, [sic] Coles , T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Can you dance the shaking of the sheets,".
Wing gives a range of dates: 1658-64.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
